justinguitar_lessons.title: Your First Chords: G, C, D

justinguitar_lessons.description: Practice switching between chords smoothly. Perfect for quiet practice!

justinguitar_lessons.description: Master essential strumming patterns. Can be practiced muted!

justinguitar_lessons.description: Put it all together with this beginner-friendly classic!

justinguitar_lessons.title: The F Chord Challenge
justinguitar_lessons.description: Conquer the infamous F chord with Justin's proven method!

yousician_lessons.title: Note Recognition Game
yousician_lessons.alternative_quiet: Use headphone amp or Tone Trainer mode
yousician_lessons.description: Fun game to learn where notes are on the fretboard!

yousician_lessons.title: Chord Hero: G C D
yousician_lessons.description: Rock out to backing tracks while practicing basic chords!

yousician_lessons.title: Rhythm Challenge
yousician_lessons.description: Test your rhythm skills against the beat!

yousician_lessons.title: Fingerpicking Fundamentals
yousician_lessons.description: Perfect for quiet practice - no pick needed!

noise_mode_quiet.suggestion: Consider fingerpicking exercises for quiet practice sessions
